name: Oh Babe It Ain't No Lie

performances.venue: Radio City Music Hall New York, NY
performances.description: The original Reckoning version of "Oh Babe, It Ain't No Lie"
Cool version in a great acoustic set.
The first and a very good one too.
Great version from a great acoustic set

performances.venue: Marin County Veterans Auditorium San Rafael, CA
performances.description: Cool version that Jerry starts and the band jumps on while Bob works out some gear issues. Last one ever, first in years, and only electric version.

performances.venue: Mill Valley Recreation Center Mill Valley, CA
performances.description: Not played since the Warfield/RCMH run, and it shows a little, but overall it’s still pretty good

performances.venue: Radio City Music Hall New York, NY
performances.description: Beautiful... I think I like this more than the Reckoning version
New Bear's Sonic Journals release sounds AMAZING!
